explanation: To calculate 25% of 200, we use the percentage formula: (Percentage/100) × Number. So, (25/100) × 200 = 0.25 × 200 = 50. Therefore, 25% of 200 is 50.

questionEn: If CODING is written as DPEJOH, how is FLOWER written?
questionHi: यदि CODING को DPEJOH लिखा जाता है, तो FLOWER को कैसे लिखा जाएगा?
subject: reasoning
explanation: In the coding pattern, each letter is shifted by +1 position in the alphabet. C→D, O→P, D→E, I→J, N→O, G→H. Applying the same pattern to FLOWER: F→G, L→M, O→P, W→X, E→F, R→S. So FLOWER becomes GMPXFS.
